title: Can i get an explanation on Jhin's damage?
body: As someone who plays Riven with a mix of lethality and bruisser items to be able to deal serious damage while also be able to survive, what can i do against 700 Jhin movement speed and his 700 damage? I'm coming back from a game where in the last team fight i got one shot from his 4th AA that dealt 2470 damage and i had around 2500 hp. As a mobility champ with 3 dashes, why am i not able to catch up to him with his insane movement speed and his AA hurts more than a full assassin legit. I feel like Jhin and few other adcs took over the assassin name
